Question
========
Can you use both GitHub Desktop and Positron for Git tasks?

Answerlist
----------
* Only if you never push changes
* No, you must pick exactly one tool forever
* Only if the repository is private
* Yes, you can mix both tools as needed

Solution
========
It is fine to use a mix of GitHub Desktop and Positron for the same repository.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* False
* True
